faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find quick and easy answers to the questions you may have about our services.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 Hisar a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 16-17 is a well-developed and centrally located residential area offering comfort, connectivity, and safety.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 16-17?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla plot sizes are commonly available.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area is family-friendly with access to schools, parks, hospitals, and markets.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 16-17 Hisar?
faqs.answer: Rental values vary based on house size, condition, and location, generally ranging from mid to premium segments.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent?
faqs.answer: Both furnished and unfurnished houses may be available depending on current listings.

faqs.question: Do rental houses include parking facilities?
faqs.answer: Most independent houses in Sector 16-17 provide dedicated parking space.

faqs.question: How does Deal Acres help tenants?
faqs.answer: Deal Acres provides verified listings, local insights, and renter-focused assistance.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 well connected to other parts of Hisar?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sector has excellent road connectivity and easy access to public transport.

faqs.question: What documents are required to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Tenants usually need ID proof, address proof, and a signed rental agreement.

faqs.question: How can I quickly find a rental house in Sector 16-17 Hisar?
